```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
```

## Analysis of Walkability/Bikeability Data

```{r}
walk_bike <- read_csv("Data Extraction PHAC Built Environment_2022_05_16.csv")

walk_bike$measure <- str_trim(walk_bike$measure)

walk_bike$'type of measure' <- str_trim(walk_bike$'type of measure')

table(walk_bike$metric)

walk_bike <- filter(walk_bike, metric != "Green Space")
```

## List and count of types of measures

```{r}
table(walk_bike$'type of measure')

table(walk_bike$measure)
```
